drupalNodeEvent.title: Global Medicine in Chinese East Asia, 1937-1970

field_description.processed: This presentation makes the case for a new concept of â€œglobal medicine" to highlight the multivalent and multidirectional flows of medical practices and ideas circulating around the world in the 20th century through the examination of two case studies on how the Chinese diaspora came to shape biomedicine in China and Taiwan from 1937 to 1970.
